sense.def:
To prod someone or something
pomeni na hitro potisniti prst ali koničast predmet v nekoga ali nekaj.

seg.quote: She prodded a bean with her fork.
Mrs Travers gave her a prod.

sense.def:
To prod someone into doing something
pomeni opomniti ali prepričevati nekoga, naj nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: ...companies who prod the ministry into action every now and again.
